timeline.bodyText: not sure if used correctly elsewhere, but Databricks is misspelled here (and on the line below)
timeline.author: CarlosTalend

timeline.bodyText: Also faulty, but it looks like the naming is consistent everywhere
timeline.author: CarlosTalend
